title: Minuteman Missile National Historic Site: Trip Itineraries
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Trip Itineraries            Itineraries        Visiting Minuteman Missile is a great experience. Here visitors join former Missile Maintenance Technician and Park Volunteer Al Hall on a tour at Launch Control Facility Delta-01 NPS   Â    Visitors to Minuteman Missile have several options that will make for a memorable experience. Depending on the amount of time available, visitors can take in one or more of the sites in the park. The following itineraries may be helpful in getting the most out of your visit. If You Have....30 Minutes Visit the Delta-09 Missile Silo for a self guided or cell phone guided tour of the site or... stop in at the Minuteman Missile Visitor Center to explore the exhibits and visit Delta-09 for a self guided or cell phone guided tour of the silo   If You Have...One Hour Stop in at the Minuteman Missile Visitor Center to explore the exhibits to learn more about the Cold War and the Minuteman Missile system and visit Launch Facility (Missile Silo) Delta-09 for a self guided or cell phone guided tour of the site or... Take a Ranger guided tour of Launch Control Facility Delta-01  If You Have...Two To Four Hours Explore the visitor center exhibits and take a Ranger guided tour of Launch Control Facility Delta-01 or... Explore the visitor center exhibits, take a Ranger guided tour of Launch Control Facility Delta-01 and visit Launch Facility (Missile Silo) Delta-09 for a self guided or cell phone guided tour of the site  If You Have...One Day  Explore the visitor center exhibits, take a Ranger guided tour of Launch Control Facility Delta-01 and visit the South Dakota Air & Space Museum to view a Missile Procedures Trainer and tour a training Launch Facility (Missile Silo)
